channel.title: Omfg.. Height

item.title: Omfg.. Height
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Please … Can someone give me a height method that will control the height of the graphic, using the following method…

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

So like… playerGfx(int id, int delay, int height) { ?

I had this…

public void playerGfx2(int id, int delay, int height) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(absY + (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(absX - (mapRegionX * 8));
outStream.createFrame(4);
outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7)
outStream.writeByte(height);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it's written in pixels 100 pixels higher
outStream.writeWord(delay);//Time before casting the graphic
}

But it don’t work, so please can someone make one, from the first method?

Read full topic
